ExampleDefinition.Title: Interaction with Annotations
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Interaction with Annotations</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates how you may interact with annotations that have been placed on a chart, using the new Annotations API as part of SciChart Premium Edition.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">To make an annotation Read-only, set AnnotationBase.IsEditable=false. Some of the annotations have IsEditable=true on this example. You can click them, drag and resize via the adorner anchor-points.</Run>
